nodes.name: Reality Cleaver
nodes.description: Cleave tears a rift in space every 5 hits, dealing 300% damage in a 10-tile cone and leaving a void that slows enemies by 70% for 3 seconds.

nodes.name: Void Embrace
nodes.description: At 30% HP or below, you become intangible and regenerate 20% HP per second for 5 seconds (60s cooldown).

nodes.name: Entropic Decay
nodes.description: Enemies near you lose 5% max HP per second as pure damage. This effect stacks with itself every 10 seconds.

nodes.name: Paradox Armor
nodes.description: 50% of damage taken is applied over 10 seconds instead. If you would die, revert 5 seconds in time (300s cooldown).

nodes.name: Freezing Nova
nodes.description: Ice Nova has a 30% chance to freeze enemies for 5 second.

nodes.name: Singularity Arc
nodes.description: Arc chains infinitely between enemies, growing 20% stronger with each jump. At 10+ chains, creates a black hole at the final target.

nodes.name: Overload Nova
nodes.description: Ice Nova now detonates twice and leaves behind cryo-mines that explode when enemies approach, freezing them for 5 seconds.

nodes.name: Quantum Entanglement
nodes.description: Spells have a 15% chance to cast twice. Duplicate spells deal 50% more damage and apply all effects.

nodes.name: Recursive Spell
nodes.description: Your spells echo 3 additional times at 50% effectiveness. Each echo has a 10% chance to trigger another full-power cast.

nodes.name: Webweaver's Wrath
nodes.description: Spiders create lingering webs on the ground that further slow and entangle enemies.

nodes.name: Arachnophobia
nodes.description: Spiders now explode on death, dealing 300% of their base hp as damage in a 4-tile radius and spawning 3 smaller spiders.

nodes.name: Skeleton Overlord
nodes.description: Every 10th skeleton summoned is an Overlord with 500% health, and 200% damage.

nodes.name: Necrotic Plague
nodes.description: Minion attacks have a 20% chance to inflict a stacking plague that deals 10% max HP per second and spreads to nearby enemies on death.

nodes.name: Singularity Core
nodes.description: All damage has a 5% chance to collapse enemies into a micro-singularity, pulling in nearby foes and dealing 1000% damage after 2 seconds.
